# datasetSize

## Summary

Captures the size of the dataset.


## Description

DatasetSize Captures how large a dataset is.
The size is to be measured in bytes.


## Metadata

`https://rdf.spdx.org/v3/Dataset/datasetSize`

|---|---|
| Name | datasetSize |
| Nature | DataProperty |
| Range | xsd:nonNegativeInteger |
